isis.stitle: Spanish - Guía para Localización de Fallas del Sistema Eléctrico - 3200, 4200, 4300, 4400, 7300, 7400, 7500, 8500, 8600 - ANTILOCK AIR BRAKE SYSTEM WITH TRACTION CONTROL: BENDIX - 9200, 9300 and 9400 - INSTALLATION - SENSOR RETAINERS

svcsubproc.title: Front Axle Retainer
svcsubproc.para: Install the front sensor retainer by pushing it into the sensor bushing from the axle side until the retainer tongues are against the sensor bushing.

svcsubproc.title: Rear Axle Retainer
svcsubproc.para: Install the rear sensor retainer by pushing it into the sensor mounting block from the axle side until the retainer tongues are against the sensor mounting block.
